dcterms:description: Flickr30k Entities augments the original Flickr30k dataset with manually-annotated region-to-phrase correspondences, allowing for richer image-to-sentence models.
dcterms:title: Flickr30k Entities (Flickr-Ent)

dcterms:creator: T.Y. Lin

dcterms:description: MS-COCO Entities enhances the original MS-COCO dataset with semi-automatically collected grounding annotations, facilitating the training of models that require spatial control.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO Entities (COCO-Ent)

dcterms:description: COCO-Ent-SSA is a derived dataset from COCO-Ent, augmented with focused and visually grounded captions using Structured Semantic Augmentation.
dcterms:title: COCO-Ent-SSA

dcterms:description: Flickr-Ent-SSA is a derived dataset from Flickr-Ent, enhanced with focused and visually grounded captions through Structured Semantic Augmentation.
dcterms:title: Flickr-Ent-SSA
